display_long_description:
Xeno Slayers throws you into a chaotic, high-stakes world where survival is everything. In this heart-racing game, you’ll find yourself running, jumping, and battling through alien-infested landscapes, all while trying to stay one step ahead—or one kill ahead—of terrifying monsters. 

You’ll face off against all sorts of creepy creatures, each more dangerous than the last, and you’ll have to rely on your quick thinking and even quicker moves to survive. Whether you decide to fight or just try to outrun them, you’ll need to be fast—because those monsters are always right behind you, waiting for the perfect moment to strike. 

The game mixes the thrill of parkour with the intensity of monster-hunting, so you’re constantly moving, whether it’s to take down a creature or escape one that’s closing in fast. There’s no time to slow down, and the tension is always high. You can team up with friends to face the chaos together, or go solo if you’re feeling brave. Either way, you’ll need nerves of steel and some serious skills to make it out alive.

Every moment in Xeno Slayers is a gamble—will you be the one doing the hunting, or will you become the hunted? The clock’s ticking, and the monsters are waiting. How long can you survive?
